Posts.Content:
Please just call me Ramona. 44, fibromyalgia, hashimoto's thyroiditis with a multiple thyroid nodules-largest one (last check was 1.5 cm), myoma (last checked, 9cm x 5cm x 7cm) enlarged uterus (11 cm long), solid breast tumors, breast cysts, chronic pain in right breast, asthma, vitiligo, scoliosis, disk bulges, rhinitis, ptosis, diplopia, "prediabetes," high blood pressure, suspected prinzmetal. 
I have a work commitment, which is why I'm putting my diagnostics and treatments on hold, but once it's done, I can't put the former off, anymore. 
I joined your forum so I could hopefully find support and advice among people like myself, who would understand. Thank you, Admins, for accepting and welcoming me.
Posts.Title: ROLL CALL name, age, state and any other info to share
